title: "Friend Notes": How To Back Them Up?
body:
Hi all, I've got a lot of friends on my friends list and a TONNE of text notes I've written over the years about each person.

How can I back these up, to say, a .TXT file on my PC?

Thank you!

replies.body: Friend notes are saved server side, so you won't need to back them up.  They will go with you wherever you go.

Anyone know if it's possible to save the "friend notes" to a .TXT file or something on my PC? 

I've got so many "friend notes" that I'm getting VERY worried about not having a backup...

It's saved entirely server side, so there's no local file that stores that info.  We haven't run into an issue where notes were lost, but if you want to be extra sure your best bet would be to copy pasta your notes on a wordpad.  Let me know if that clears things up!

It just seems like it'd take a really long time for me to save each friend note to a Wordpad file. 

Is there another way I can do it?

Thank you!

Thanks for your reply!

Is there a way I can do this quickly because I've got as many friends as RIOT will allow...
Is there another way I can backup my "friends notes" without opening each each note individually into word pad as this would take a very long time...
I'd really appreciate it if someone had an idea for how I could backup my friend's notes?

Thanks, but what if there's a problem on RIOT's server?

I'm still eager to back up my "friend notes".
